mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NAME ) VALUES( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{name} )
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, NAME, REGDATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, NAME, REGDATE FROM ( SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, NAME, REGDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
